name: Color Squeezy
description:
Would you like the whole world to be a canvas for you? Collect to paint rollers, improve. Come under the paint-spill faucets and add color to your paint roller. Want more colors? The paint pool is waiting for you, jump in and get a new color. Color the paint rollers that you will collect in many ways. Complete your paint roller as in your dreams and start painting everywhere now. Remember, the more paint rollers you have, the more paint you can make.

Features:
• Smooth gameplay
• Toony art style
• Dynamic mechanism
• Engaging levels
